name: Knights Pledge
description:
Fact Sheet
  • Developers: Bogdan- Valentin Fuiorea, Ahmed Aabart
  • Release Date: 30/03/2021
  • Platforms Desktop (browser)
  • For a press copy, get in touch via e-mail!
Description

Let's save the kingdom world!

The adventure of a knight who decided to save the kingdom from evil that has conquered the castle and its surrounding. The knight will face numerous dangers, such as arrow shooting traps and ghosts/ skeletons that roam around the castle's halls. Can you survive and bring peace into the kingdom?

Features
  • Jump your way into action with the use of bounce pads
  • Dodge all the dangerous traps so you make it till the end
  • 3 keys, 3 doors - can you find them all? 

  • Why so many enemies? Wait till you meet the boss!
  • At least we've given you power-ups!
Trailer Press Quotes

"Incredible gameplay! Reminds me of my childhood games; such cute choice for graphics. I would recommend this game to everyone"  - Buzz

"Knight's Pledge is a spectacular adventure that lays down a path of great gameplay ideas. It’s beautiful, breakneck-paced, and bubbling over with creativity, and playfulness and experimentation are rewarded at every turn. " - IN
